bibl.title: Oil Specification in the Papyri: What is "elaion"?
bibl.note: The scope of this paper is limited to the III century B.C. - Cf., du même auteur: Oils in Ptolemaic Egypt: The Provisions of P. Rev. in the Light of the Papyri (Duke University, 1977).

bibl.title: Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III

bibl.seg: Sandy D. Brent, Oil Specification in the Papyri: What is "elaion"?
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 1317-1323.
The scope of this paper is limited to the III century B.C. - Cf., du même auteur: Oils in Ptolemaic Egypt: The Provisions of P. Rev. in the Light of the Papyri (Duke University, 1977).
